meta.title: From TAKE to DIRECTION
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: This week's Raddles are in honor of the upcoming season of "[Make Some Noise](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKBcWn-tqWE)," which premieres on Monday, October 13. Each show features a set of improvisational prompts, along with some minigames. One such game is "[Take Some Direction](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/U4OVSVIMZG8)", where the contestants must say the same phrase over and over again, each in a different way.

ladder.clue: Anagram <> to get a kind of tree
A piece of tableware that sounds like <> plus a direction
Variety you might put in a <> that starts with a double letter
Change the first letter of <> to get something said while leaving
Drop the middle 4 letters of <> to get a drop
Drop half of <> to get a victory
